title: The Do Kwon Arrest
description: A fast breakdown of The Do Kwon Arrest for builders.

hook.text: Do Kwon, the founder of Terra-Luna, fled South Korea after his algorithmic stablecoin collapsed, destroying $40 billion.

buildup.text: Interpol issued a Red Notice. Kwon traveled through Singapore, Dubai, and Serbia using falsified travel documents.

discovery.text: He was arrested in Montenegro in 2023 carrying fake Costa Rican and Belgian passports.

twist.text: Both the US and South Korea requested extradition. The legal battle over who would try him lasted over a year.

climax.text: Kwon was eventually extradited to the US. His case shows that crypto founders can't outrun the law forever.

punchline.text: Fake passports and a Red Notice. You can't run from $40 billion in losses.

quiz.question: How was Do Kwon caught?
options: Arrested in Montenegro with fake passports after an Interpol Red Notice
He was found on social media
